Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kodwa ukusibona kwabo sisondela, ubuso babo bangakholwayo, buya kunxunguphala kuze kuthiwe (kubo): “Oko ke koko nanikubiza
Yithi (Muhammad), “Niyabona phofu ukuba uAllâh Anganditshabalalisa ndawonye nabo bakunye nam okanye Asenzele inceba, ngubani ongabakhusela bona abangakholwayo esohlwayeni esibuhlungu
Yithi: “NguSolubabalo; thina sikholiwe kuYe, kananjalo kukuYe apho sixhomekeke khona. Kwaye niza kwazi okokuba ngubani na osekulahlekeni okucacileyo.”
Yithi: “Niyijongile phofu (yona into yokuba): xa amanzi wenu ebenokusuka atshoniswe emhlabeni, ngubani omnye obeza kunizela namanzi ampompozayo
Kananjalo	inene	wena	(ungumntu)	oziphethe	kakuhle kakhulu
Ngoko ke uza kubona, nabo baza kubona
Inene iNkosi yakho yiYo Eyaziyo okokuba ngubani na olahlekileyo eNdleleni yaYo, IkwayiYo Ebaziyo abakhokelelekileyo
Wona anqwenela ukuba ugobele ngakuwo, kanti ngawo amakagobele (ngakuwe)
Kananjalo ungamthobeli nawuphi na umfungeli ongento yanto
Xa iiVesi zeThu zicengcelezwa kuye, uthi: “Zintsomi zabantu bakudala!”
